author: Jessica
excerpt: Little wintery week over here! Can you tell we’ve been cooped up in the house? Gorgeous winter sunsets… temps were in the negatives… kids didn’t have in-person school. Ooomph. Max finished up his tournament on Monday! Jordan’s fave. I made pita with yeast last week. For almost a year I’ve strictly baked with sourdough! When […]
text: Little wintery week over here! Can you tell we’ve been cooped up in the house? Gorgeous winter sunsets… temps were in the negatives… kids didn’t have in-person school. Ooomph. Max finished up his tournament on Monday! Jordan’s fave. I made pita with yeast last week. For almost a year I’ve strictly baked with sourdough! When you ask me how I read so much… I even do it in the car wash. Lot of basketball. The best little sibling cheer squad! Jordan thrilled beyond belief he got to have a skittle. Don’t worry, I still don’t think Max (first born) has ever had a skittle. Jordan (third born) just tried one at 3 years old. This is what they love to do after the game. Max teaches him sooo much about sports. It’s super cute! Started her wicked lego set right before bed… Finished as soon as she woke up! Loves anything that twirls. So.much.hockey. Max had four hockey games in 15 hours. And more basketball games! Never thought that this would be my life (actually in my 20s I thought it sounded horrible) and now I LOVE IT. Little coloring besties. As long as I take 10 million snacks we’re good. He’s so fun to watch! Caught her sitting like this which was too adorable. How much longer do we have to stay?! And this is how I found them this morning watching Wicked. The cutest!!
html:
Little wintery week over here!

Can you tell we’ve been cooped up in the house?

Gorgeous winter sunsets… temps were in the negatives… kids didn’t have in-person school. Ooomph.

Max finished up his tournament on Monday!

Jordan’s fave.

I made pita with yeast last week. For almost a year I’ve strictly baked with sourdough!

When you ask me how I read so much… I even do it in the car wash.

Lot of basketball.

The best little sibling cheer squad!

Jordan thrilled beyond belief he got to have a skittle. Don’t worry, I still don’t think Max (first born) has ever had a skittle. Jordan (third born) just tried one at 3 years old.

This is what they love to do after the game.

Max teaches him sooo much about sports.

It’s super cute!

Started her wicked lego set right before bed…

Finished as soon as she woke up!

Loves anything that twirls.

So.much.hockey.

Max had four hockey games in 15 hours.

And more basketball games!

Never thought that this would be my life (actually in my 20s I thought it sounded horrible) and now I LOVE IT.

Little coloring besties.

As long as I take 10 million snacks we’re good.

He’s so fun to watch!

Caught her sitting like this which was too adorable.

How much longer do we have to stay?!

And this is how I found them this morning watching Wicked. The cutest!!
